metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4216 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: XMPCore in Adobe XMP Toolkit for Java before 5.1.3 allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via XML data containing an external entity declaration in conjunction with an entity reference, related to an XML External Entity (XXE) issue.

criterions.comment: libxmpcore-java package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.1.3-1').
